definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 16:34 hire of harlot ( = [[אֶתְנׇה]]);—abs. ´[[א]]: Ez Eze 16:34, Eze 16:41, [[אֶתְנׇ֑ן]] Ho 9:1 +; cstr. [[אֶתְנַן]] De 23:19 +; sf. [[אֶתְנַנׇּהּ]] Is 23:18, [[נַׇּ֠הַ]] v:Is 23:17; pl. sf. [[אֶתְנַנֶּיהָ]] Mic 1:7 a (We proposes [[אֲשֵׁרֶיהָ]], cf. Now Marti);—harlot’s hire, De 23:19 ([[זוֹנׇה]] ´[[א]]:); elsewhere in fig.: of idolatrous Israel Ho 9:1, Jerus. Ez Eze 16:31, Eze 16:34, Eze 16:34, Eze 16:41, Tyre Is 23:17, Is 23:18; of costly idols of Samaria Mic 1:7 b, Mic 1:7c, cf. v:Mic 1:7 a (v. supra).
